body.p: Consequently, the 2010 ED proposed that entities should calculate interest income on plan assets using the rate used to discount the defined benefit obligation. This approach produces interest income that is equivalent to determining a net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset). The difference between the actual return on assets and the interest income on plan assets is included in the remeasurements component (see paragraph BC86).
